text: Elvio Flores (born 7 March 1939) is an Argentine equestrian. He competed in two events at the 1964 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:Living people Category:Argentine male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Argentina Category:Equestrians at the 1964 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Elvio Flores
